extension.name: Emundus - Sync jos_emundus_setup_teaching_unity with an Aurion data table.
extension.author: eMundus
extension.description: This plugin will synchronize the teaching_unity table with a table containing data from an Aurion import.

field.name: au_ids_years
field.description: Enter a single Aurion Id corresponding to the table to be used for years or a comma separated list (in case of multiple tables being the source of your years).
field.label: Year Aurion ID(s)

field.name: year_programme_id
field.label: Programme ID (optional if code is provided)
